long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the Extension!
Note: Change your language to English(US).
* Click on the Extension icon.
* Load your friend list (1st Step)
* Follow the (2nd Step)
* Then click on (Start Removing) button.
* Enjoy!

* Mass deleting unwanted friends on Facebook(TM)  has never been easier With this extension you can mass delete all unwanted friends from Facebook(TM).
